errors.org_not_found: Organization not found for this user
errors.start_required: Please provide a valid start date
errors.end_required: Please provide either a return date or expected end date
errors.start_after_end: Start date must be before the end date
errors.start_too_old: Start date cannot be more than one year in the past
errors.car_not_found: Selected car not found or is no longer available
errors.car_wrong_org: Selected car does not belong to your organization
errors.customer_wrong_org: Selected customer does not belong to your organization
errors.car_unavailable: This car is already rented during the selected time period. Please choose different dates or another car.
errors.paid_exceeds_total: Amount paid cannot exceed the total price for fixed contracts
errors.rent_not_found_or_deleted: Rental contract not found or has already been deleted
errors.cannot_delete_active: Cannot delete this rental as it is currently active. Please complete or cancel it first.
errors.delete_failed: Unable to delete rental contract. Please try again or contact support.
errors.create_failed: Unable to create rental contract. Please try again or contact support.
errors.update_failed: Unable to update rental contract. Please try again or contact support.
errors.invalid_iformation: Some of the provided information is invalid. Please check your input.
errors.missing_required_info: Required information is missing. Please fill in all required fields
errors.rental_already_exists: A rental with these details already exists. Please check your input.
errors.availability_failed: Unable to check car availability. Please try again.
errors.images_fetch_failed: Failed to retrieve rent with images
